razor-wind.description: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

cut.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

vine-whip.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

headbutt.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

tackle.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

growl.description: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

leech-seed.description: Seeds the target, stealing HP from it every turn.

growth.description: Raises the user’s Attack and Special Attack by one stage.

razor-leaf.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

solar-beam.description: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.

petal-dance.description: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

toxic.description: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

double-team.description: Raises the user’s evasion by one stage.

defense-curl.description: Raises user’s Defense by one stage.

light-screen.description: Reduces damage from special attacks by 50% for five turns.

skull-bash.description: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.  User charges for one turn before attacking.

flash.description: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

rest.description: User sleeps for two turns, completely healing itself.

snore.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

curse.description: Ghosts pay half their max HP to hurt the target every turn.  Others decrease Speed but raise Attack and Defense.

protect.description: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

mud-slap.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

giga-drain.description: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

endure.description: Prevents the user’s HP from lowering below 1 this turn.

swagger.description: Raises the target’s Attack by two stages and confuses the target.

fury-cutter.description: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, maxing out after five turns.

attract.description: Target falls in love if it has the opposite gender, and has a 50% chance to refuse attacking the user.

sleep-talk.description: Randomly uses one of the user’s other three moves.  Only works if the user is sleeping.

return.description: Power increases with happiness, up to a maximum of 102.

frustration.description: Power increases as happiness decreases, up to a maximum of 102.

safeguard.description: Protects the user’s field from major status ailments and confusion for five turns.

sweet-scent.description: Lowers the target’s evasion by one stage.

synthesis.description: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

hidden-power.description: Power and type depend upon user’s IVs.  Power can range from 30 to 70.

sunny-day.description: Changes the weather to sunny for five turns.

roar.description: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

hyper-beam.description: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

fire-punch.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

scratch.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

bite.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

ember.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

flamethrower.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

strength.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

fire-spin.description: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

dig.description: User digs underground, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

rage.description: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

smokescreen.description: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

fire-blast.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

rock-slide.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

slash.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

scary-face.description: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

belly-drum.description: User pays half its max HP to max out its Attack.

outrage.description: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

dynamic-punch.description: Has a 100% chance to confuse the target.

dragon-breath.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

iron-tail.description: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

ancient-power.description: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

rock-smash.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

beat-up.description: Hits once for every conscious Pokémon the trainer has.

wing-attack.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

fly.description: User flies high into the air, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.

earthquake.description: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dig users.

sandstorm.description: Changes the weather to a sandstorm for five turns.

steel-wing.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Defense by one stage.

ice-punch.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

tail-whip.description: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

mist.description: Protects the user’s stats from being changed by enemy moves.

water-gun.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

hydro-pump.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

surf.description: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Dive users.

ice-beam.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

blizzard.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

confusion.description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

withdraw.description: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.

haze.description: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.

waterfall.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

bubble.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flail.description: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.

foresight.description: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Normal and Fighting moves even if it’s a Ghost.

icy-wind.description: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

rollout.description: Power doubles every turn this move is used in succession after the first, resetting after five turns.

rapid-spin.description: Frees the user from binding moves, removes Leech Seed, and blows away Spikes.

rain-dance.description: Changes the weather to rain for five turns.

mirror-coat.description: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last special hit it took.

whirlpool.description: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.

string-shot.description: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

harden.description: Raises the user’s Defense by one stage.

gust.description: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.

whirlwind.description: Immediately ends wild battles.  Forces trainers to switch Pokémon.

psybeam.description: Has a 10% chance to confuse the target.

psychic.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

nightmare.description: Target loses 1/4 its max HP every turn as long as it’s asleep.

poison-sting.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

twineedle.description: Hits twice in the same turn.  Has a 20% chance to poison the target.

agility.description: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages.

focus-energy.description: Increases the user’s chance to score a critical hit.

sludge-bomb.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

pursuit.description: Has double power against, and can hit, Pokémon attempting to switch out.

sand-attack.description: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

quick-attack.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

mirror-move.description: Uses the target’s last used move.

detect.description: Prevents any moves from hitting the user this turn.

counter.description: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last physical hit it took.

thunder.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

screech.description: Lowers the target’s Defense by two stages.

hyper-fang.description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

super-fang.description: Inflicts damage equal to half the target’s HP.

flame-wheel.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.

reversal.description: Inflicts more damage when the user has less HP remaining, with a maximum of 200 power.

shadow-ball.description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

thunderbolt.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

leer.description: Lowers the target’s Defense by one stage.

peck.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

drill-peck.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

tri-attack.description: Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

false-swipe.description: Cannot lower the target’s HP below 1.

slam.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

wrap.description: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

acid.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

spite.description: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.

crunch.description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

thunder-punch.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

thunder-shock.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

zap-cannon.description: Has a 100% chance to paralyze the target.

metal-claw.description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

take-down.description: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

disable.description: Disables the target’s last used move for 1-8 turns.

charm.description: Lowers the target’s Attack by two stages.

body-slam.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

horn-attack.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

amnesia.description: Raises the user’s Special Defense by two stages.

thrash.description: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

pound.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

minimize.description: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

metronome.description: Randomly selects and uses any move in the game.

dream-eater.description: Only works on sleeping Pokémon.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

encore.description: Forces the target to repeat its last used move every turn for 2 to 6 turns.

moonlight.description: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

psych-up.description: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s.

double-edge.description: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

leech-life.description: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

mean-look.description: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

swords-dance.description: Raises the user’s Attack by two stages.

absorb.description: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

baton-pass.description: Allows the trainer to switch out the user and pass effects along to its replacement.

pay-day.description: Scatters money on the ground worth five times the user’s level.

cross-chop.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

future-sight.description: Hits the target two turns later.

karate-chop.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

low-kick.description: Inflicts more damage to heavier targets, with a maximum of 120 power.

seismic-toss.description: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

meditate.description: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

extreme-speed.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

bubble-beam.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

mind-reader.description: Ensures that the user’s next move will hit the target.

submission.description: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

teleport.description: Immediately ends wild battles.  No effect otherwise.

barrier.description: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.

recover.description: Heals the user by half its max HP.

reflect.description: Reduces damage from physical attacks by half.

kinesis.description: Lowers the target’s accuracy by one stage.

rolling-kick.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

aurora-beam.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Attack by one stage.

constrict.description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

mega-punch.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

rock-throw.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

stomp.description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

lock-on.description: Ensures that the user’s next move will hit the target.

lick.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

perish-song.description: User and target both faint after three turns.

sludge.description: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

acid-armor.description: Raises the user’s Defense by two stages.

clamp.description: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

spikes.description: Scatters Spikes, hurting opposing Pokémon that switch in.

night-shade.description: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s level.

psywave.description: Inflicts damage between 50% and 150% of the user’s level.

destiny-bond.description: If the user faints this turn, the target automatically will, too.

bind.description: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

vice-grip.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

crabhammer.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

mega-drain.description: Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

egg-bomb.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

bone-club.description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch.

mega-kick.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

jump-kick.description: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.

high-jump-kick.description: If the user misses, it takes half the damage it would have inflicted in recoil.

mach-punch.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

smog.description: Has a 40% chance to poison the target.

pain-split.description: Sets the user’s and targets’s HP to the average of their current HP.

soft-boiled.description: Heals the user by half its max HP.

heal-bell.description: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

present.description: Randomly inflicts damage with power from 40 to 120 or heals the target for 1/4 its max HP.

dizzy-punch.description: Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

octazooka.description: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

twister.description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

mimic.description: Copies the target’s last used move.

powder-snow.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

transform.description: User becomes a copy of the target until it leaves battle.

sharpen.description: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.

conversion.description: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.

conversion-2.description: Changes the user’s type to a random type either resistant or immune to the last move used against it.

sky-attack.description: User charges for one turn before attacking.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

bide.description: User waits for two turns, then hits back for twice the damage it took.

spider-web.description: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

spark.description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

cotton-spore.description: Lowers the target’s Speed by two stages.

morning-sun.description: Heals the user by half its max HP.  Affected by weather.

sketch.description: Permanently becomes the target’s last used move.

triple-kick.description: Hits three times, increasing power by 100% with each successful hit.

milk-drink.description: Heals the user by half its max HP.

sacred-fire.description: Has a 50% chance to burn the target.  Lets frozen Pokémon thaw themselves.
